page.title: 13Housing in the Hemingfords
page.content: Housing in the Hemingfords is extremely varied in type and value. Most housing is privately owned, although there are two small areas of council houses, one in Hemingford Grey around Pound Rd and another in Hemigford Abbots in Rideaway Drive. These last houses are distinctive in being thatched council houses. Housing in Hemingford Abbots tends to be of great architectural interest. Most houses are thatched and many date from Elizabethan times. All are much sought after because of their character and charm. the village of Hemingford Abbots attracts tourists from this country and abroad, some just passing through and others to stay in the caravan site by the river.
